doc.field: A RM f8903reute r f BC-NOBLE-BROADCAST-GROUP 03-18 0053
NOBLE BROADCAST GROUP TO SELL DEBENTURES

Noble Broadcast Group Inc said it filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission a registration statement covering a 50 mln dlr issue of senior subordinated debentures due 1999. The company named PaineWebber Inc as sole underwriter of the offering. Reuter
